main event: A singular circular white object was observed at a high elevation, which changed illumination and disappeared from view after approximately three minutes.
interesting points: The observation occurred on February 17, 1962, and lasted three hours., The object was described as having a bright illumination that changed to pale., Witnesses experienced physical sensations such as numbness and fear during a separate sighting in Modesto, California., The report included multiple pages of unphotographed documents from Project Blue Book., One witness, Mario Zuccala, described seeing a large saucer-shaped object emitting a bright white light that moved rapidly and silently.
sighted object: a circular white object and a large saucer-shaped object
witness description: Eyewitnesses reported glowing lights, physical sensations, and a large fiery object.
